entry.title: testing multi lxc and nginx reverse proxy
entry.content:
Simulating multi-containers to nginx multi-virtual-host

This is a simulation case where you only have one public ip but need to serve multiple apps from multiple frameworks or else.

entry.title: hello, ghpage
entry.content:
I am solie

This is my first post on my new blog. While not super informative it should convey my sense of excitement and eagerness to engage with you, the reader!
